haircut on managing macs

About

Author

I’m Matthew Warren. I’m currently the Apple Systems Administrator at UNC Asheville.

I write about managing Macs using Jamf Pro, Python, and other tools.

This is my personal site, and views expressed here do not necessarily reflect those of my employer.

I’m usually on the MacAdmins Slack Team; feel free to direct message me.

You can also find my projects on GitHub, and various snippets on Gist.

Generation and Theme

This site is generated using Jekyll.

The theme is based on Tale by Chester How, which I’ve customized for my preferences.

Privacy

I respect your privacy, so this site is not configured to track you. All assets are served locally.

This is a static site served over HTTPS that does not use cookies, Javascript, CDN assets, or analytics/tracking. It is hosted using GitHub Pages, so GitHub may receive information about your connection. Read GitHub’s privacy policy for more details.

Fonts

  • Sans serif text is set in Noto Sans, by Google.
  • Serif text is set in Noto Serif, by Google.
  • Monospaced text is set in Space Mono by Colophon Foundry.

Fonts are served locally with the help of google-webfonts-helper.
